div.p: JPS will be posting weekly remote learning plans for students to access.

span.a: Click here to access the remote learning

p.strong: Get the latest school information & updates related to the Coronavirus (COVID-19)

div.p: The foundation of Jenison Public Schools is built on RELATIONSHIPS and SERVICE. Developing and maintaining meaningful and long lasting relationships with the students we are privileged to serve is one of our district’s highest priorities. We are committed to working closely with the families who choose to partner with Jenison Public Schools in educating their children. Our focus is on developing the whole child intellectually, socially, emotionally, and physically.

We are excited to be able to offer a world-class education that prepares students to achieve their goals and chase their dreams. The JPS Fine Arts programming is recognized nationwide for its excellence in performance. Our athletic offerings provide numerous opportunities for students to be part of highly competitive teams. The Jenison community has generously provided our students, educators, directors, and coaches with incredible facilities to train and perform.

I would encourage you to explore our website to learn more about Jenison Public Schools. If I can be of service to you or answer any questions you may have about all that JPS has to offer, please don’t hesitate to contact me at ttenbrin@jpsonline.org.

div.span: View the calendar for next school year.
Pre-Register students for the upcoming 2020-2021 school year.
Request transportation for your student, notify us if your student no longer requires transportation, or need to make a change for drop-off/pick-up location.
The Cat's Corner is a completely student run store located at Jenison High School. The store features Jenison clothing for all ages, spirit items, snacks, and great gift ideas.
The Jenison Public Education Foundation invites you to become part of our district's legacy by purchasing a brick paver engraved with your personal message.

div.div: We don't have to look hard to find the helpers in our community. Thank you Jenison!!! @JPSBeRelentless #WeAreJenison Continue...
